name: SuperClaude Vercel
tagline: Vercel deployment intelligence using two specialists
description: Vercel deployment intelligence using two specialists â€” devops-engineer (deployment pipeline analysis, CI/CD optimization, environment configuration, rollback strategies) and performance-engineer (build profiling, bundle analysis, edge function optimization, cold start reduction). Returns deployment diagnostics with actionable optimization recommendations. Activates on "Vercel build slow", "deployment failed", "optimize edge functions", "Vercel configuration".

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server that orchestrates multi-agent wave execution. Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Shared authentication secret between OpenClaw and the bridge server. Prevents unauthorized agent execution.
